articles.description: BPCL Share Price: BPCL shares rose 5% despite a 35% net profit drop. Revenue was Rs 1.32 lakh crore. A 1:1 bonus was approved. Ebitda for the reporting quarter came in at Rs 9,213 crore. FY24 net profit was 26,673 crore.
